channel.title: iPhone 4S
channel.description:
Ok, own up - who's getting/got one?
I've preordered mine but unfortunately won't be arriving until next week :(

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

I use around 1gb/month.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i use lots of data. I use my phone for wifi tethering. so its my only source of internet at my apartment. i use like 100mb/hr(based on my cr-48, was just on fb and almost used my whole 100mb in 1 hr.) sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

100mb/month seems to be plenty for me, on average I end up using about 1.7Mb per month, sometimes up to 10Mb. It’s pretty simple, I use Wifi wherever possible (most places) and DroidWall to only allow applications I actually need to access the internet. Like Gmail, Google Voice, Maps and Browser.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:52, topic:417964”][quote author=Niall link=topic=520510.msg3838783#msg3838783 date=1323067595]

In NZ it is $7.78US for 5000 TXTs per month. But then calls are like $0.40 a minute - and don’t even try using internet.

my old(4~ months ago) mobile internet costed $8 NZD per freaking megabyte and now costs $1.2 NZD per megabyte, how bad can it be
[/quote]
and i thought the US carriers raped its customers.[/quote]

well the internet was resold from another provider who charged much less in both cases but yeah

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

Idk what my parents pay but its probably something near $460 for 5 lines a month with unlimited everything or maybe it $190 for 5 lines, 1500 shared minutes(only non-mobile phones), unlimited everything else(calling any mobile phone). if its the 3000 minute service then its $230. the only problem is service isnt as good as verizon. we had to buy a $250 device to use our existing internet to give us cell service(we are out in the middle of no where, verizon actually had hardly any service there til like 5 years ago or so). Im pretty sure its one of the cheaper prices I dont think we pay $460 a month. Oh we have sprint btw.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

SilentCJ:

Got my HTC Sensation XE last week, paying £20.50 a month which gets me 200 mins unlimited texts and 500mb data, and the handset was only £20, not bad for a phone that’s on amazon for £450, plus beats headphones which are worth 60 quid.

When i upgraded i used the O2 recycle and paid £18.99 to upgrade.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

I pay £35 and get 5000 minutes, 3000 texts and “All-You-Can-Eat” (aka Truly Unlimited, no fair usage etc) Data, not the best deal but I like having no limit on the internet usage

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Ouch, I pay $29.99 for 1200 minutes, 3000 texts, and 100mb of data through Page Plus Cellular (no contract). You can use any verizon phone and get the same service, as you just use verizon’s network anyhow.

I pay double that for half the value, except I get 1.5GB of data on a service that’s to slow to use it up by the end of the month.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

I upgraded from my 4 on last friday, this is what i was paying

Iphone 4, ( i decided to make what i found to be a silly mistake and lower the contract, i used to be on unlimited texts 300 mins for £32 a month… swapped for £27 a month for 100 min 500 txts as i didnt think i used that many turned out i did)

So i got: 500 texts, 100 minutes, 500mb data.

Traded in my 4 and paid £18.99 to get the 4s, now for £27 a month i get unlimited texts, 200 minutes 500 data.

IMO and to me, it was well worth the upgrade.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I’d rather have a Droid 3.

Got it!

My opinion droid 3>iPhone 4S. For one reason only. A keyboard is a MUST.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4S
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

t4:

why can’t we have phones with 999 battery instead of 999 processing power

Smartphones keep getting thinner as battery technology gets better. It would be nice to have a huge gurt battery in a smartphone with 999 processing power.

brb carrying round mini-nuclear reactor.

Read full topic
